en.banner_describe: UnitedStack has cloud training to lecturers, take you to the professional road.
en.banner_describe_mobile: UnitedStack has cloud training to lecturers
en.controller: The same party remote access controller (iDRAC) technology eliminates agent function, simplifies the server deployment, configuration and update of the entire OpenManage product portfolio.
en.efficient: Efficient IT operation simplifies and automatically implements basic server lifecycle management tasks.
en.ethernet_ports: With up to 4 Gigabit Ethernet ports, it provides high speed network transmission capability, selectable Gigabit Ethernet ports, and provides more I/O options.
en.get_deep: Get deep information about system operation and speed up deployment
en.helping: Helping clients build and manage efficient infrastructure for data centers
en.high_availability: High availability, hard disk, power, fan and other major components support hot plug redundant function, reduce downtime risk, and ensure business safety.
en.low_cost: Low cost, high capacity hard disk to enhance application performance
en.optimizing: Optimizing data center energy consumption with higher performance power ratio.
en.performance_char: With the help of accelerator and GPU, the performance of HPC, VDI and imaging environment is greatly improved.
en.reduce: Reduce manual steps and reduce human errors
en.speed_up: Speed up access to application data
en.support_inte: Support 2 Intel Xeon E5-2600V3/V4 series processors, the largest 44 core, and 24 DDR4 memory slots, providing powerful computing performance.
en.title: hardware
en.trxd: TR730xd can be used as an excellent database server, providing more than one million times of IOPS performance.

zh.banner_describe: 高可用高密度的低成本服务器平台，为特殊应用行业和高密度计算环境专门设计
zh.banner_describe_mobile: 高可用高密度的低成本服务器平台，为特殊应用行业和高密度计算环境专门设计
zh.banner_title: 标准型 安全型 可靠型
zh.controller: 同方远程访问控制器(iDRAC)技术可免代理功能，简化整个OpenManage产品组合的服务器部署、配置和更新。
zh.efficient: 高效IT运营，简化并自动执行基本的服务器生命周期管理任务。
zh.ethernet_ports: 标配高达4个千兆网口，提供高速网络传输能力，可选万兆网口，提供更多I/O选择。
zh.get_deep: 获得深入的系统运行状况信息并加快部署
zh.helping: 帮助客户构造和管理适用于数据中心，高效基础架构
zh.high_availability: 高度的可用性，硬盘、电源、风扇等主要部件支持热插拔冗余功能，降低停机风险，保障业务安全。
zh.innovation_management: 通过智能自动化实现创新管理
zh.low_cost: 低成本高容量硬盘，提升应用程序性能
zh.optimizing: 凭借更高的性能功耗比，优化数据中心的能耗。
zh.performance_char: 借助加速器和GPU，大幅提高HPC、VDI和成像环境的性能。
zh.reduce: 减少手动步骤，减少人为错误
zh.speed_up: 加快应用程序数据访问
zh.support_inte: 支持2颗Intel Xeon E5-2600V3/V4系列处理器，最大44个核心，及24个DDR4内存插槽，提供强悍计算性能。
zh.title: 硬件设备
zh.trxd: TR730xd可以作为一款优秀的数据库服务器，提供超过一百万次IOPS的性能。
